009package imagingbook.pdf;
010
011public abstract class Utils {
012        
013        public static boolean verifyPdfLib() {
014                try {
015                        if (Class.forName("com.lowagie.text.Document") != null) {
016                                return true;
017                        }
018                } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) { }
019                return false;
020        }
021
022}
